CustomField.description: for Sales: age between assignment date and discarded date
CustomField.formula: IF( AND( NOT (ISNULL (Discarded_Date__c )), NOT (ISNULL (Last_assignment_to_sales_rep__c)), Last_discarded_by__r.Id = Previous_owner_main__r.Id), Discarded_Date__c - Last_assignment_to_sales_rep__c, 00 )
CustomField.label: Age assigned to discarded
